Flicker finished with the first load and headed back
for the second.

OOC: How many loads should this take?

--- cardhead649 <cardhead649@...> wrote:
> Torin and Gatara assist in the unloading, while
> Riekan keeps his hand 
> planted firmly on Phoenix's shoulder, his harpoon
> gun at the ready.
> 
> For the first time, Phoenix looks up.  An expression
> of childlike 
> wonder crosses her face as she sees the outdoors for
> what she thinks 
> is the first time.  But she's a little confused,
> because it all 
> vaugely reminds her of something ... something that
> occasionally 
> flashes through her dreams ...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...>
> wrote:
> > Flicker wants to rush over to her, but realizes it
> would not be for 
> > the best, so he begins unloading quickly.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649"
> <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > Gatara activates a remote control as she lands,
> decloaking the 
> ship 
> > > and allowing Flicker his first good look.  It's
> not nearly as big 
> > as 
> > > a battleship, but the latter would have a rough
> time fighting the 
> > > former - Rogue Star bristles with assorted
> weaponry, not all of 
> it 
> > > Cybertronian in origin.
> > > 
> > > "Personally, I don't care about the rubber duck.
>  You'll see her, 
> > all 
> > > right," she tells him, "but she's staying right
> here until 
> exactly 
> > > half your ship's cargo is aboard Rogue Star. 
> Riekan!  Jayde!  
> > > Torin!  Let's go, already!"
> > > 
> > > The two males tramp out of the ship, with
> Phoenix between them, 
> > head 
> > > down.  She's a mess - she hasn't seen the inside
> of a CR chamber 
> in 
> > a 
> > > long time.  There's no sign of the other Rogue.
> > > 
> > > "Well, where's Jayde?" Gatara asks, irritated.
> > > 
> > > "Last I saw, she was in her sister's room,"
> Torin explained.
> > > 
> > > Gatara rolls her eyes.  "That explains it. 
> Alright, let's get 
> this 
> > > stuff unloaded."
> 
>
